alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm wind gusts will impact portions of west central Big Horn, northeastern Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 1258 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm wind gusts near Pryor, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pryor around 110 AM MDT. Billings and Lockwood around 140 AM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Edgar and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
